page.title: 12N. BANNISTER Pt 2
page.content: When assembly is finished we go back to class and carry on with our work.At 10.40 we go out for playtime.I usually play football.We come back in at 11.00. We keep going on with our work until 12.30.We leave the classroom and line up for dinner.I have sandwiches. It takes me quarter of an hour to eat my dinner.I then go out and play football.We come in when the whistle goes again.We start our work.We keep going all afternoon until 3.15 when it is time to go home.When I get home I get changed and do my homework.We then have tea.I play for an hour and a half until bath and bedtime.
